Name: Mystic Tide
Story Background: As the coastal tides wane, so do the secrets held within the depths of the ocean. Wielders of water magic tap into this ebbing energy, turning the tides of battle.
Ability: Counter target spell unless its controller pays 3. If you control an Island, you may return target creature to its owner's hand.
Appearance Description: A swirling vortex of azure water, reflecting the moon's shimmering light, looms above a troubled battlefield. Within the vortex, the fluid form of a merfolk mage weaves the tides and currents with a graceful, commanding presence.
